comments.body: nit: can't we here override `def isBarrier` to return `false` in order to avoid the unneeded synchronization introduced by lazy?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -110,4 +110,6 @@ class ShuffledRDD[K: ClassTag, V: ClassTag, C: ClassTag](
     super.clearDependencies()
     prev = null
   }
+
+  @transient protected lazy override val isBarrier_ : Boolean = false
